Name.description: An arbitrary string (a nickname) assigned to a playback key pair that helps the customer identify that resource. The value does not need to be unique.
Name.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary string (a nickname) assigned to a playback key pair that helps the customer identify that resource. The value does not need to be unique.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

PublicKeyMaterial.description: The public portion of a customer-generated key pair.
PublicKeyMaterial.markdownDescription:
The public portion of a customer-generated key pair.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.
Tags.markdownDescription:

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
Key-pair identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:playback-key/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
